document.docAuthor: Fachin, Diego Aguilar, Couri, Márcia Souto & Mello-Patiu, Cátia Antunes De
document.masterDocTitle: An illustrated catalogue of the types of Stratiomyidae (Diptera: Brachycera) in the collection of Museu Nacional, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An illustrated catalogue of the types of Stratiomyidae (Diptera: Brachycera) in the collection of Museu Nacional, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph: PUJOL-LUZ & GODOI, 2010: 68–70 (ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION); 69, FIGS 1 (LATERAL HABITUS, MALE HOLOTYPE), 2 (HEAD, FRONTAL VIEW, MALE HOLOTYPE), 3 (HEAD, DORSAL VIEW, MALE HOLOTYPE), 4 (HEAD, LATERAL VIEW, MALE HOLOTYPE), 5 (ANTENNA, MALE HOLOTYPE), 6 (THORAX, DORSAL VIEW, MALE HOLOTYPE), 7 (WING, MALE HOLOTYPE) AND 20 (THORAX, DORSAL VIEW, MALE PARATYPE); 70, FIGS 8 (MALE GENITALIA, DORSAL VIEW, HOLOTYPE), 9 (EPANDRIUM, DORSAL VIEW, HOLOTYPE) AND 10–12 (PHALLIC COMPLEX, HOLOTYPE); 71, FIGS 13 (LATERAL VIEW, FEMALE), 14 (FEMALE HEAD, FRONTAL VIEW), 15 (FEMALE HEAD, DORSAL VIEW), 16 (FEMALE HEAD, LATERAL VIEW), 17 (FEMALE ANTENNA), 18 (FEMALE, THORAX, DORSAL VIEW) AND 19 (FEMALE WING).

paragraph.materialsCitation: Type locality: Brazil , Rio de Janeiro , Rio de Janeiro , Represa Rio Grande.

Holotype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [ Represa ] Rio Grande | Rio de Janeiro | Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “ F.M. Oliveira |
v-72
[1972]”; (3) printed on red paper: “HOLÓTIPO”; (4) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”.

subSubSection.paragraph: Condition of type : good, with left antenna and wing slide–mounted and terminal part of abdomen with terminalia retained in a microvial with glycerin, both pinned below the specimen. Missing part: last four tarsomeres of right hind leg.

Additional note: this species was not listed in the supplement of world catalog of the Stratiomyidae (Woodley 2011) . Five and four males paratypes with the same locality data as the below paratypes specimens are deposited in the Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas da Amazônia ( INPA ) and Museu de Zoologia da
Universidade de São Paulo
( MZUSP ), respectively.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
VIII.69
[ viii.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
VIII.69
[ viii.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good. Missing part: left antenna.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
IX.69
[ xi.1969 ]”; (3) printed on green paper: “ Barbiellinia illaetabilis | Godoi & Pujol-Luz | PARÁTIPO”; (4) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (5) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”.

Condition of type : terminal part of abdomen and terminalia retained in a microvial with glycerin pinned below the specimen. Missing parts: last four tarsomeres of fore right leg, all tarsomeres of mid left leg and tibia and all tarsomeres of hind left leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
IX.69
[ ix.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : right wing damaged on costal vein.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
IX.69
[ ix.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good. Missing part: right antenna.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
IX.69
[ ix.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good. Missing parts: all tarsomeres of left hind leg and the last three tarsomeres of right hind leg.

Paratype ♀ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
IX.69
[ ix.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : right wing damage on costal vein and discal cell, terminal part of abdomen and terminalia retained in a microvial with glycerin and left antenna slide–mounted, both pinned below the specimen. Missing parts: left and right hind legs and left wing.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : left wing damage on costal vein. Missing parts: femur, tibia and all tarsomeres of left hind leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good. Missing parts: left antenna and all tarsomeres of right hind leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good. Missing parts: left antenna and wing, femur, tibia and all tarsomeres of left and right fore legs, right mid leg, and three last tarsomeres of left hind leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good. Missing parts: left antenna and all tarsomeres of right hind leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : good. Missing parts: last three tarsomeres of left hind leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : fore legs and right hind leg in a microvial without glycerin pinned below the specimen. Missing part: left antenna.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition of type : terminal part of abdomen and terminalia retained in a microvial with glycerin pinned below the specimen. Missing parts: antennae, all tarsomeres of right hind leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [Represa] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “M. Alvarenga [Moacir Alvarenga] |
X.69
[ x.1969 ]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–5 . TYPE SPECIMENS, LATERAL AND DORSAL VIEW. 1–2.
Macromeracis brasiliensis
(LINDNER), FEMALE HOLOTYPE. 3–4.

PUJOL-LUZ & GODOI
, MALE HOLOTYPE. 5.
Abavus maculatus
LINDNER
, MALE HOLOTYPE. SCALE BAR, 1 MM.

subSubSection.paragraph: Condition of type : terminal part of abdomen and terminalia retained in a microvial with glycerin pinned below the specimen. Missing parts: left antenna, right wing, and all tarsomeres of right fore leg.

Paratype ♂ with labels: (1) printed on white paper: “Repr. [ Represa ] Rio Grande | Jacarepaguá | Rio [ City and State of Rio de Janeiro ], Brasil ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “ M. Alvarenga [ Moacir Alvarenga ] |
x.69
[1969]”; (3) printed on yellow paper: “ MNRJ ”; (4) printed on green paper: “PARÁTIPO”. Condition type : good.
